response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and potential impact, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This represents a significant savings compared to the market rate, while still ensuring a fair return for us. I am confident that this investment will pay dividends for your operations. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.", "product_price": 14000}
